definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: And how hear we every man in our own tongue, wherein we were born?
sentences.chinese: 我們各人，怎樣聽見他們說我們生來所用的鄉談呢。

sentences.english: They always withdraw when talking about the key issues.
sentences.chinese: 說到關鍵問題的時候，他們倆總是鄉談。
